verses.name: Joshua 2:7
verses.text: And the men pursued after them the way to Jordan unto the fords: and as soon as they which pursued after them were gone out, they shut the gate.

verses.name: Joshua 2:8
verses.text: And before they were laid down, she came up unto them upon the roof;

verses.name: Joshua 2:9
verses.text: And she said unto the men, I know that the Lord hath given you the land, and that your terror is fallen upon us, and that all the inhabitants of the land faint because of you.
